title: Polki Drop Earrings - Kundan Jhumka Style
features: Exquisite design featuring a cascading series of Polki diamonds set in traditional Kundan style. The floral motif around each Polki adds a touch of elegance. The earrings are meticulously handcrafted with intricate detailing, showcasing the artistry of our skilled artisans.
occasions: and special occasions. These earrings will beautifully complement traditional sarees and lehengas
making you the star of the event.
description: Timeless elegance and traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The Polki diamonds offer a unique sparkle and are ethically sourced. Durable construction ensures these earrings will be a cherished heirloom for generations. A true investment in cultural heritage and beauty.
